name: PricingCardNine
description: Pricing cards with image, price tag, title, feature checklist, and CTA button.

description.example: Choose the plan that fits your goals

button.note: ButtonConfig with text and href or onClick

features.note: Array of feature strings displayed as checklist

propsSchema.plans: Array<{ id: string, title: string, price: string, period: string, features: string[], button: {text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}, imageSrc: string, imageAlt?: string }>
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>

usageExample: <PricingCardNine plans={[{ id: 'basic', title: 'Basic', price: '$59', period: '/month', imageSrc: '/images/plan-basic.jpg', button: { text: 'Get in touch', href: '#contact' }, features: ['Free initial consultation', '1x per 2 weeks training plan update', 'Weekly checking'] }]} animationType="slide-up" title="Coaching Plans" description="Choose the plan that fits your goals" textboxLayout="default" useInvertedBackground="noInvert" />
